Meet Liz

Head Barista & Founder

Discover the passion and artistry behind every cup at The Coffee Corner.

The Coffee Corner Story

With over 15 years of experience in the coffee world, Liz has perfected the art of sourcing, roasting, and brewing exquisite coffees. Starting her journey in a small cafe in Seattle, she learned the importance of using only the finest, ethically sourced beans.

After working with some of the most prestigious roasters across the country, she returned home with a dream: to create the perfect cup of coffee that would bring joy to every customer's day.

The Coffee Corner opened its doors in 2018 with a simple mission: to brew the most delicious and high-quality coffee for our community. What started as a small neighborhood coffee cart has grown into a beloved destination, but we've never forgotten our roots.

Every cup that leaves our counter is a testament to our commitment to excellence. We guarantee that every ingredient, from start to finish, maintains the highest standards of quality, and we treat every customer like family.

Our Philosophy

Quality Beans

We source only the finest single-origin beans from ethical farms around the world to ensure every sip is exceptional.

Brewed with Passion

We believe that passion is the secret ingredient that makes our coffee truly special and memorable.

Expertly Crafted

Every drink is made by hand, respecting the unique character of each bean and brewing method.
